My Work

Check out some of my projects...

SUPER SHOPPER

Super shopper is my industrial project that i developed for crunch and flourish as a front end developer

MAIN LEARNINGs

• Developed the final design for the project used ux tool figma
• Developed the front-end of the project by using combination of HTML5, CSS3, Java script and BOOTSTRAP.
• Learned about task management using Trello tool
• Got huge experience about sprint planning daily stand ups.

Github

VIDEO RENTAL

It is a project for renting movies to the customers.giving price of the movie which varies according to the movie. Generating statistics that gives a brief that which customer took most movies and the best selling movie.

MAIN LEARNINGS

A, Started using Microsoft SQL .
B, Making of new database.
C, Learnt how to create table and rows both manually and by tools.
D, learnt how to create primary and foreign keys
E, Learnt how to create relationships.

Github

DAY AT DOG RACE

In this project i covered more complex use of IF and ELSE statements and full use of timer and time picker.




MAIN LEARNINGs

A, Learnt to use attaching more than one picture and set them on timer to control when the picture appear and disappear.
B, Generating sores and storing it in database.
C, Each and for each statements.

Github

RUSSIAN ROULETTE

This game is built with the use c# this was my first project in college where i learnt how to create classes, main uses of function and variables, if and else statements . From this project i started learning about how to work with Windows Forms.

MAIN LEARNINGS

A, Use of picture box
use of text box, labels
B. How to set the timer to disappear the picture box after the interval of time.
C, Score and round generating connecting one form to another form
